display_name: Boot or Logon Initialization Scripts: Logon Script (Mac)

executor.name: manual
executor.steps: 1. Create the required plist file sudo touch /private/var/root/Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist 2. Populate the plist with the location of your shell script sudo defaults write com.apple.loginwindow LoginHook /Library/Scripts/AtomicRedTeam.sh 3. Create the required plist file in the target user's Preferences directory touch /Users/$USER/Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist 4. Populate the plist with the location of your shell script defaults write com.apple.loginwindow LoginHook /Library/Scripts/AtomicRedTeam.sh
